ti:edition.ti:label: Metamorphoses
ti:edition.ti:description: Ovid. Die Metamorphosen des P. Ovidius Naso, Volume 1-3. Magnus, Hugo, editor. Gotha, Germany: F.A. Perthes. 1892-1919.

ti:translation.ti:label: Metamorphoses
ti:translation.ti:description: Ovid. Metamorphoses. More, Brookes, translator. Boston: Cornhill Publishing Co., 1922.

ti:translation.ti:label: Metamorphoses
